thread.title: defi SOLUTIONS Founder and CEO Named LendIt Fintech Industry Awards Finalist for Fintech Woman of the Year

author: cnbc.com
title: defi SOLUTIONS Founder and CEO Named LendIt Fintech Industry Awards Finalist for Fintech Woman of the Year
text:
Hear “Moving the Full Financing Process Online” by CRO Georgine Muntz on Tuesday, April 10 at 11:50 a.m. PT
GRAPEVINE, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Recognizing her accomplishments as a leading finance industry executive, influencer and innovator, Stephanie Alsbrooks , founder and CEO of defi SOLUTIONS, has been named a finalist for Fintech Woman of the Year by LendIt Fintech , organizers of the world’s largest conferences for financial technology innovation.
Fintech Woman of the Year finalists are being honored as having demonstrated outstanding leadership, integrity, performance and team-building within their company, while at the same time contributing to the advancement of the industry. The top honoree will be named at the LendIt Fintech Industry Awards Show and Dinner on April 10th at the LendIt Fintech USA 2018 Conference in San Francisco.
“I’m incredibly honored to be included in this line-up of women bringing new technologies to the marketplace,” said Stephanie. “I can see this group helping to reshape and improve the finance marketplace for years to come.”
According to Peter Renton, co-founder and co-chairman of LendIt Fintech, “This year’s finalists are the most innovative individuals and companies disrupting the future of finance in order to improve the quality of daily life. We were yet again impressed by the number of high-caliber nominees and look forward to celebrating these individuals and companies that have made impressive contributions to the fintech industry.”
Under Stephanie’s leadership, defi SOLUTIONS has delivered an innovative, lender-centric solutions platform that addresses the entire loan application lifecycle. defi has experienced a greater than 70 percent compounded annual growth rate since inception and earlier this year Stephanie helped orchestrate a $55 million investment from Bain Capital Ventures to help accelerate the development of existing and future products, expand resources and facilities, and grow the support, technology, and sales and marketing teams.
defi SOLUTIONS will be presenting and exhibiting at the LendIt Fintech USA 2018 Conference on April 9 to 11, at San Francisco’s Moscone Center. Georgine Muntz ’s conference breakout session, entitled “Moving the Full Financing Process Online,” will take place on Tuesday, April 10 from 11:50 a.m. – 12:30 p.m. PT. defi SOLUTIONS will be showcasing their innovative loan origination, management and analytics platform throughout the conference.
To arrange a demo or a meeting with defi SOLUTIONS at the LendIt Fintech USA 2018 Conference, please click here.
To view all LendIt Fintech Industry Award finalists, visit: www.lendit.com/usa/2018/awards .
About defi SOLUTIONS
From loan originating and servicing to analytics, document management, direct lending and portfolio sales, defi SOLUTIONS’ customizable, cloud-based loan origination system (LOS) and management platform was created by lenders for lenders. The company’s suite of products developed for innovative lenders include defi LOS , defi SERVICING , defi ANALYTICS , defi DIGITAL , defi DIRECT and defi EXCHANGE . For additional information about defi SOLUTIONS’ cutting-edge platform or to schedule a demo, visit: www.defisolutions.com .
About LendIt Fintech
LendIt Fintech is a recognized global internet finance industry leader, founded in New York in 2013. Its aim is to gather industry elites to discuss and explore the latest trends in the development of international financial technology. LendIt Fintech has become the largest event in financial services innovation as it hosts three annual conferences, LendIt Fintech USA , LendIt Fintech Europe , and Lang Di Fintech , and dozens of complementary online and in-person industry events. LendIt Fintech also owns and operates one of the world’s leading industry educational channels, Lend Academy.
